MIT Professor Calls for HALT of the mRNA Vaccine Program Due to Serious Adverse Events and Death

Professor Retsef Levi is an MIT Expert in Analytics, Risk Management, Health Systems, Food & Agriculture Systems, Manufacturing, & Supply Chain Management. Professor Levi has been making an impact lately, with calls to put a complete halt on the COVID mRNA vaccine program.

Professor Levi joined the DailyClout’s podcast, CloutCafe, to discuss his concerns about the mRNA vaccine, including excess mortality rates, increased rates of cardiac events among young men in Israel, and other adverse outcomes.

Professor Levi’s serious concerns about the mRNA vaccination program include specific events and findings and led to a short viral video that explained his position.

Professor Levi recently posted online that he had obtained data from the Israeli Emergency Medical Service (EMS) system regarding ambulance calls for cardiac arrests. In the first half of 2021, Israel mass-vaccinated most of its population. According to the centralized EMS data, there was a 25% increase in ambulance calls for cardiac events in ages 16-39 in the first half of 2021, alongside the mRNA vaccination campaign.

Professor Levi notes that while we cannot definitively conclude the cause, the known connection between mRNA vaccination and myocarditis, and the fact that myocarditis causes cardiac events must lead to further investigation.

The response from the Israeli Ministry of Health to this signal was to dismiss it by saying that the Israeli EMS can’t be relied upon to diagnose patients properly, the need for resuscitation in many of the cases notwithstanding.

Further investigation is still urgently needed.

Professor Levi referenced a study published in Thailand that tracked adolescents pre- and post-vaccination and found an increase in cardiac events post-vaccination.

The third study Professor Levi referenced studied autopsy reports of 25 people who suffered cardiac arrest and sudden death within 20 days of getting vaccinated that prove that the cardiac event was related to the vaccine.

Professor Levi explained a thread he recently posted on Twitter that presents a graph based on a study done by the MOH of vaccinated people who died of non-COVID reasons after they got vaccinated, split into two stages.

The Israeli Ministry of Health Knew About The Risks

The Israeli Ministry of Health (MOH) was exposed in a leaked video as having been warned about a variety of side effects by a research team commissioned by the MOH to look for side effects. Dr. Yaffa Shir-Raz, Ph.D., health and risk communication researcher and health journalist, broke that story:

As Professor Levi mentioned, these are not just numbers and studies. There are real people who have died, and many who are currently suffering. An Israeli organization created The Testimonies Project while the disaster was unfolding.

Unfortunately, instead of honoring Professor Levi with the respect his position and experience deserve, those who have no interest in listening to Professor Levi choose to attack him.

Professor Retsef Levi is calling on his colleagues to demand transparency from governmental public health agencies, and to treat those who were harmed by the COVID mRNA vaccine with dignity, and a focus on helping them heal.
